meanings.definition: A person who walks at a slow, relaxed pace.
meanings.sent1: The elderly couple were content amblers in the park.
meanings.sent2: The amblers strolled leisurely along the beach.
meanings.sent3: The amblers took their time, enjoying the scenery around them.
meanings.sent4: The amblers moved like gentle clouds drifting in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The amblers sauntered peacefully, leaving a trail of tranquility behind.

meanings.definition: A group of people or animals walking at a slow, relaxed pace.
meanings.sent1: The tourists formed a line of amblers exploring the city.
meanings.sent2: The herd of cows were amblers on their way back to the barn.
meanings.sent3: The amblers moved in unison, creating a calming rhythm.
meanings.sent4: The amblers resembled a flowing river of relaxation.
meanings.sent5: The amblers paraded slowly, like a procession of peace.
